item.title: Setup for C#
item.description: For the entirety of this course, we will be coding in C# with the help of Visual Studio and .NET. The Integrated Development Environment Visual Studio (VS) is an integrated development environment (IDE). An IDE is like a text editor on steroids. We can write and edit code and make use of additional features that enhance our coding experience. VS offers code completion hints, debugging, and even it’s own compiler.

item.title: Next Steps
